input.sentences: i went to an art exhibit .
there was art from ancient societies .
my friend was amused by many of it .
some of the art was more modern
including an interesting piece that looked like an alien .
output.sentences: This piece has cheetas dressed as bride and groom.
The next piece is an ancient artifact.
My friend found it all rather amusing.
The modern art here is quite lovely.
The last piece is definitely open to interpretation.
